mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sn AS "num", a.name AS "name", a.tender_type AS "tenderType", a.entrust_unit AS "entrustUnit", a.entrust_money AS "entrustMoney", a.bid_money AS "bidMoney", a.opentender_time AS "tenderOpenTime", a.bid_time AS "bidTime", a.notice_media AS "noticeMedia", a.notice_date AS "noticeDate", a.remark AS "remark", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.is_history as "isHistory", a.is_center AS "isCenter"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project( sn, name, tender_type, entrust_unit, entrust_money, bid_money, opentender_time, bid_time, notice_media, notice_date, remark, org_id, is_history, is_center ) VALUES ( #{num}, #{name}, #{type}, #{entrustUnit}, #{entrustMoney}, #{bidMoney}, #{tenderOpenTime}, #{bidTime}, #{noticeMedia}, #{noticeDate}, #{remark}, #{orgId}, #{isHistory}, #{isCenter} )
mapper.update: UPDATE project SET sn = #{num}, name = #{name}, tender_type = #{type}, entrust_unit = #{entrustUnit}, entrust_money = #{entrustMoney}, bid_money = #{bidMoney}, opentender_time = #{tenderOpenTime}, bid_time = #{bidTime}, notice_media = #{noticeMedia}, notice_date = #{noticeDate}, remark = #{remark}, org_id = #{orgId}, is_center = #{isCenter} WHERE id = #{id}
